about_the_game:
"Frontline: New Revolution" is an Exploration, Action, Challenge, Survival and Multiplayer game with a futuristic, post apocalyptic and immersive narrative. Play the role of Razr, a super strong and intelligent agent, very important for the multiversal balance, always accompanied by his robot friend, Jas 3158.2, better known as Jas, as he explores futuristic, medieval, cyberpunk scenarios and seeks to protect and maintain peace in the multiverse at all costs.

This project is an Indie game currently being developed by us, Wise Labs, with two multiplayer modes being in Tactical Shooting genre mixed with Battle Royale, we are bringing the best of both worlds, this way being the Safe Zone, which will only be activated after of the bomb being planted, being slower. Thus, its only function is to protect players from natural threats such as lightning, meteors, earthquakes, etc. There will be ammo boxes scattered throughout the maps in case your stockpile runs out. The story mode is a big RPG world like Horizon Zero Dawn having some missions with CO-OP and X1 functions between players, each one being able to choose their team.

The story will take place after a terrible world war, which caused the planet to be destroyed, and people were forced to leave the planet, arriving at Tupã (habitable planet), of which they star in several mysteries:

Realities enter into crisis from the moment when the barrier between a dimension known as "Collapse" that contains distortions, antimatter, destructive anomaly and inexplicable entity and our existential plan weakens bringing the collapse to our dimension doing so, with that strange things happen. Because of this, a clan was created. The Balance Clan, known for their strength, emotional stability, and the ability to keep their sanity when everything is falling apart. The CNU (Confederation of the United Nations) was also created, a group focused on controlling all anomalies ever discovered. The people who are part of this clan dedicate their lives to just investigating and solving the strange things that happen in the outside world, this with the aim of preventing the universe from falling into crisis again. However, the leader of that clan, Shan Rigel, was brutally murdered by the leader of the Thanagarians, Eros (brother of Razr). In this way Razr is recruited again on a mission to assemble The Defenders of the CNU (an elite military order that protects all existing realities) and hunt down the Thanagarian survivors.

short_description: "Frontline: New Revolution", is an online and offline third-person shooter. Team up with your partners in Deathmatch, Suicide Missions, Zombies and Plant Bomb matches. If you're tired of these functions, we also have the story mode, which contains offline and online missions with friends.
